title: Fun custom game options
body:
It'd be really nice if there were fun custom game options so people could play with their friends more, say add options to have unlimited mana, cooldowns extremely shortened, invincibility, insane speed. 

Plus having this in the game could help bring in more players, $$ you know you want it Riot

replies.body:
I don't even know why they are called custom games.

You can't customize %%%% all.

Yess! Plus changing stuff such as the level certain players start on, how much gold, etc. This is a must! There would be so much more capacity to the idea of " custom " games. There would be fun new gamemodes, and overall more people playing customs so you don't have to wait 10-20 minutes for a game of hide n seek or donger. Plus the new custom gamemodes would become viral on youtube and on the boards. There's so many ideas for customs!

It'd be cool.
Also, stuff like being able to use deleted items would be fun. Its a custom, so you should be able to cstomize!
